title: Clear night, slow city driving with frequent braking.
caption: A red car drives slowly on a city street at night with frequent braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 3.6 m/s). There are 13 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving slowly on a city street at night. There are many other cars on the road, and the traffic lights are green. The street is well-lit with streetlights and neon signs from nearby buildings.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because it is in a city environment with many other cars on the road.
